indexPage.aboutText: With over 14 years in the tech world, my journey started with a solid foundation in computer science and IT systems, evolving into a dedicated full-stack developer focused on the JavaScript ecosystem. I'm passionate about building performant, user-friendly, and scalable web solutions using modern tools like React, Next.js, and Astro. I thrive on bringing ideas to life and have a strong track record leading projects from concept to launch, both independently and within collaborative teams. Beyond coding, I'm always exploring emerging technologies and enjoy traveling.
indexPage.ctaText: Seeking impactful full-time remote opportunities as a **Programmer** or **IT & Technology Specialist**. I bring extensive experience, strong problem-solving skills, and expertise in modern technologies (incl. JavaScript, React, Next.js, Astro). Eager to contribute to innovative solutions within a productive and friendly team.
